body_html: @dsmilkov Could you please explain where this directory (tensorflow/tensorboard) that the instructions in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tensorboard/README.md instructs you to do 3 installations? Is it in /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/tensorboard, or the source (i.e. git clone) that you downloaded to your home directory?
